data.title: David C. Miller, M.D.
images: https://www.urologygroup.com/physician/david-c-miller/<iframe title="Dr. David Miller - The Urology Group, Cincinnati OH" width="500" height="281" src="https:/www.youtube.com/embed/wZ-Xjr6NTug?rel=0" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
data.meta_description: In Middletown, OH, Dr. David Miller specializes in robotic surgery for prostate cancer, enlarged prostate, kidney stones, erectile dysfunction and incontinence.
data.text:
I need help with ‘Billing Questions’

What number should I call to pay my bill?

If your bill is from The Urology Group, please call (513) 841-7474 to pay your bill.

If your bill is from The Urology Center, please call (513) 841-7475 to pay your bill.
